-- a⊔b = b + (a - b)⁺

theorem sup_eq_mul_pos_div [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b : α) : «expr ⊔ » a b = b * «expr ⁺» (a / b) :=

-- Needed for squares
-- Needed for squares
-- A linearly ordered additive commutative group is a lattice ordered commutative group
-- see Note [lower instance priority]
-- Special case of Bourbaki A.VI.9 (1)
-- c + (a ⊔ b) = (c + a) ⊔ (c + b)
@[to_additive]
theorem mul_sup [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b c : α) : c * «expr ⊔ » a b = «expr ⊔ » (c * a) (c * b) :=

@[to_additive abs_sup_sub_sup_le_abs]
theorem mabs_sup_div_sup_le_mabs [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b c : α) :
    |«expr ⊔ » a c / «expr ⊔ » b c| ≤ |a / b| :=
  by

  · rw [abs_div_sup_mul_abs_div_inf]

-- 0 ≤ a implies |a| = a
@[to_additive abs_of_nonneg]
theorem mabs_of_one_le [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a : α) (h : 1 ≤ a) : |a| = a :=
  sup_eq_left.2 <| Left.inv_le_self h

mabs_mul_le:
-- Banasiak Proposition 2.12, Zaanen 2nd lecture
/-- The absolute value satisfies the triangle inequality.
-/
@[to_additive abs_add_le "The absolute value satisfies the triangle inequality."]
theorem mabs_mul_le [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b : α) : |a * b| ≤ |a| * |b| :=
  by
  apply sup_le
  · exact mul_le_mul' (le_mabs a) (le_mabs b)
  · rw [mul_inv]
    exact mul_le_mul' (inv_le_abs _) (inv_le_abs _)
#align mabs_mul_le mabs_mul_le
mabs_mabs:
/-- The unary operation of taking the absolute value is idempotent. -/
@[simp, to_additive abs_abs "The unary operation of taking the absolute value is idempotent."]
theorem mabs_mabs [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a : α) : ||a|| = |a| :=
  mabs_of_one_le _ (one_le_abs _)
#align mabs_mabs mabs_mabs

    |«expr ⊓ » a c / «expr ⊓ » b c| ≤ |a / b| :=

  · rw [abs_div_sup_mul_abs_div_inf]
  · exact one_le_abs _

@[to_additive pos_abs]
theorem m_pos_abs [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a : α) : «expr ⁺» (|a|) = |a| :=
  by
  nth_rw 2 [← pos_div_neg (|a|)]
  rw [div_eq_mul_inv]
  symm
  rw [mul_right_eq_self, inv_eq_one]
  exact m_neg_abs a

m_neg_part_def:

@[to_additive neg_abs]
theorem m_neg_abs [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a : α) : «expr ⁻» (|a|) = 1 :=
  by
  refine' le_antisymm _ _
  · rw [← pos_inf_neg_eq_one a]
    apply le_inf
    · rw [pos_eq_neg_inv]
      exact ((m_le_iff_pos_le_neg_ge _ _).mp (inv_le_abs a)).right
    · exact And.right (Iff.mp (m_le_iff_pos_le_neg_ge _ _) (le_mabs a))
  · exact one_le_neg _

m_le_iff_pos_le_neg_ge:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁺» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁺» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻» -/
-- Bourbaki A.VI.12 Prop 9 c)
@[to_additive le_iff_pos_le_neg_ge]
theorem m_le_iff_pos_le_neg_ge [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b : α) :
    a ≤ b ↔ «expr ⁺» a ≤ «expr ⁺» b ∧ «expr ⁻» b ≤ «expr ⁻» a :=
  by
  constructor <;> intro h
  · constructor
    · exact sup_le (h.trans (m_le_pos b)) (one_le_pos b)
    · rw [← inv_le_inv_iff] at h
      exact sup_le (h.trans (inv_le_neg a)) (one_le_neg a)
  · rw [← pos_div_neg a, ← pos_div_neg b]
    exact div_le_div'' h.1 h.2
#align m_le_iff_pos_le_neg_ge m_le_iff_pos_le_neg_ge
m_Birkhoff_inequalities:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
-- Commutative case, Zaanen, 3rd lecture
-- For the non-commutative case, see Birkhoff Theorem 19 (27)
-- |(a ⊔ c) - (b ⊔ c)| ⊔ |(a ⊓ c) - (b ⊓ c)| ≤ |a - b|
@[to_additive Birkhoff_inequalities]
theorem m_Birkhoff_inequalities [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b c : α) :
    «expr ⊔ » (|«expr ⊔ » a c / «expr ⊔ » b c|) (|«expr ⊓ » a c / «expr ⊓ » b c|) ≤ |a / b| :=
  sup_le (mabs_sup_div_sup_le_mabs a b c) (mabs_inf_div_inf_le_mabs a b c)
#align m_Birkhoff_inequalities m_Birkhoff_inequalities
le_mabs:
@[to_additive le_abs]
theorem le_mabs (a : α) : a ≤ |a| :=
  le_sup_left
#align le_mabs le_mabs
inv_sup_eq_inv_inf_inv:

-- Special case of Bourbaki A.VI.9 (2)
-- -(a ⊔ b)=(-a) ⊓ (-b)
@[to_additive]
theorem inv_sup_eq_inv_inf_inv [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b : α) : («expr ⊔ » a b)⁻¹ = «expr ⊓ » a⁻¹ b⁻¹ :=
  (OrderIso.inv α).map_sup _ _
#align inv_sup_eq_inv_inf_inv inv_sup_eq_inv_inf_inv
#align neg_sup_eq_neg_inf_neg neg_sup_eq_neg_inf_neg

-- -a ≤ a⁻
@[to_additive]
theorem inv_le_neg (a : α) : a⁻¹ ≤ «expr ⁻» a :=
  le_sup_left
#align inv_le_neg inv_le_neg
inv_le_abs:
-- -a ≤ |a|
@[to_additive]
theorem inv_le_abs (a : α) : a⁻¹ ≤ |a| :=
  le_sup_right
#align inv_le_abs inv_le_abs
inv_inf_eq_sup_inv:

-- -(a ⊓ b) = -a ⊔ -b
@[to_additive]
theorem inv_inf_eq_sup_inv [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b : α) : («expr ⊓ » a b)⁻¹ = «expr ⊔ » a⁻¹ b⁻¹ :=
  (OrderIso.inv α).map_inf _ _
#align inv_inf_eq_sup_inv inv_inf_eq_sup_inv
#align neg_inf_eq_sup_neg neg_inf_eq_sup_neg

inf_sq_eq_mul_div_abs_div:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
-- 2•(a ⊓ b) = a + b - |b - a|
@[to_additive two_inf_eq_add_sub_abs_sub]
theorem inf_sq_eq_mul_div_abs_div [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b : α) :
    «expr ⊓ » a b ^ 2 = a * b / |b / a| := by
  rw [← inf_mul_sup a b, ← sup_div_inf_eq_abs_div, div_eq_mul_inv, div_eq_mul_inv, mul_inv_rev, inv_inv, mul_assoc,
    mul_inv_cancel_comm_assoc, ← pow_two]
#align inf_sq_eq_mul_div_abs_div inf_sq_eq_mul_div_abs_div
inf_mul_sup:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
#print inf_mul_sup /-
-- Bourbaki A.VI.10 Prop 7
-- a ⊓ b + (a ⊔ b) = a + b
@[to_additive]
theorem inf_mul_sup [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b : α) : «expr ⊓ » a b * «expr ⊔ » a b = a * b :=
  calc
    «expr ⊓ » a b * «expr ⊔ » a b = «expr ⊓ » a b * (a * b * «expr ⊔ » b⁻¹ a⁻¹) := by
      rw [mul_sup b⁻¹ a⁻¹ (a * b), mul_inv_cancel_right, mul_inv_cancel_comm]
    _ = «expr ⊓ » a b * (a * b * («expr ⊓ » a b)⁻¹) := by rw [inv_inf_eq_sup_inv, sup_comm]
    _ = a * b := by rw [mul_comm, inv_mul_cancel_right]
    
#align inf_mul_sup inf_mul_sup
#align inf_add_sup inf_add_sup
-/
inf_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
#print inf_mul /-
@[to_additive]
theorem inf_mul [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b c : α) : «expr ⊓ » a b * c = «expr ⊓ » (a * c) (b * c) :=
  (OrderIso.mulRight _).map_inf _ _
#align inf_mul inf_mul
#align inf_add inf_add
-/
inf_eq_div_pos_div:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁺» -/
-- Bourbaki A.VI.12 (with a and b swapped)
-- a⊓b = a - (a - b)⁺
@[to_additive]
theorem inf_eq_div_pos_div [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b : α) : «expr ⊓ » a b = a / «expr ⁺» (a / b) :=
  calc
    «expr ⊓ » a b = «expr ⊓ » (a * 1) (a * (b / a)) := by
      rw [mul_one a, div_eq_mul_inv, mul_comm b, mul_inv_cancel_left]
    _ = a * «expr ⊓ » 1 (b / a) := by rw [← mul_inf 1 (b / a) a]
    _ = a * «expr ⊓ » (b / a) 1 := by rw [inf_comm]
    _ = a * «expr ⊓ » (a / b)⁻¹ 1 := by
      rw [div_eq_mul_inv]
      nth_rw 1 [← inv_inv b]
      rw [← mul_inv, mul_comm b⁻¹, ← div_eq_mul_inv]
    _ = a * «expr ⊓ » (a / b)⁻¹ 1⁻¹ := by rw [inv_one]
    _ = a / «expr ⊔ » (a / b) 1 := by rw [← inv_sup_eq_inv_inf_inv, ← div_eq_mul_inv]
    
#align inf_eq_div_pos_div inf_eq_div_pos_div
abs_inv_comm:
-- |a - b| = |b - a|
@[to_additive]
theorem abs_inv_comm (a b : α) : |a / b| = |b / a| :=
  by
  unfold has_abs.abs
  rw [inv_div a b, ← inv_inv (a / b), inv_div, sup_comm]
#align abs_inv_comm abs_inv_comm

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
-- See, e.g. Zaanen, Lectures on Riesz Spaces
-- 3rd lecture
-- |a ⊔ c - (b ⊔ c)| + |a ⊓ c-b ⊓ c| = |a - b|
@[to_additive]
theorem abs_div_sup_mul_abs_div_inf [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b c : α) :
    |«expr ⊔ » a c / «expr ⊔ » b c| * |«expr ⊓ » a c / «expr ⊓ » b c| = |a / b| :=
  by
  letI : DistribLattice α := lattice_ordered_comm_group_to_distrib_lattice α
  calc
    |«expr ⊔ » a c / «expr ⊔ » b c| * |«expr ⊓ » a c / «expr ⊓ » b c| =
        «expr ⊔ » («expr ⊔ » b c) («expr ⊔ » a c) / «expr ⊓ » («expr ⊔ » b c) («expr ⊔ » a c) *
          |«expr ⊓ » a c / «expr ⊓ » b c| :=
      by rw [sup_div_inf_eq_abs_div]
    _ =
        «expr ⊔ » («expr ⊔ » b c) («expr ⊔ » a c) / «expr ⊓ » («expr ⊔ » b c) («expr ⊔ » a c) *
          («expr ⊔ » («expr ⊓ » b c) («expr ⊓ » a c) / «expr ⊓ » («expr ⊓ » b c) («expr ⊓ » a c)) :=
      by rw [sup_div_inf_eq_abs_div («expr ⊓ » b c) («expr ⊓ » a c)]
    _ =
        «expr ⊔ » («expr ⊔ » b a) c / «expr ⊔ » («expr ⊓ » b a) c *
          («expr ⊓ » («expr ⊔ » b a) c / «expr ⊓ » («expr ⊓ » b a) c) :=
      by
      rw [← sup_inf_right, ← inf_sup_right, sup_assoc, @sup_comm _ _ c («expr ⊔ » a c), sup_right_idem, sup_assoc,
        inf_assoc, @inf_comm _ _ c («expr ⊓ » a c), inf_right_idem, inf_assoc]
    _ =
        «expr ⊔ » («expr ⊔ » b a) c * «expr ⊓ » («expr ⊔ » b a) c /
          («expr ⊔ » («expr ⊓ » b a) c * «expr ⊓ » («expr ⊓ » b a) c) :=
      by rw [div_mul_div_comm]
    _ = «expr ⊔ » b a * c / («expr ⊓ » b a * c) := by
      rw [mul_comm, inf_mul_sup, mul_comm («expr ⊔ » («expr ⊓ » b a) c), inf_mul_sup]
    _ = «expr ⊔ » b a / «expr ⊓ » b a := by
      rw [div_eq_mul_inv, mul_inv_rev, mul_assoc, mul_inv_cancel_left, ← div_eq_mul_inv]
    _ = |a / b| := by rw [sup_div_inf_eq_abs_div]
    
#align abs_div_sup_mul_abs_div_inf abs_div_sup_mul_abs_div_inf
abs_abs_div_abs_le:
-- | |a| - |b| | ≤ |a - b|
@[to_additive]
theorem abs_abs_div_abs_le [CovariantClass α α (· * ·) (· ≤ ·)] (a b : α) : ||a| / |b|| ≤ |a / b| :=
  by
  rw [abs_eq_sup_inv, sup_le_iff]
  constructor
  · apply div_le_iff_le_mul.2
    convert mabs_mul_le (a / b) b
    rw [div_mul_cancel']
    exact covariant_swap_mul_le_of_covariant_mul_le α
  · rw [div_eq_mul_inv, mul_inv_rev, inv_inv, mul_inv_le_iff_le_mul, abs_inv_comm]
    convert mabs_mul_le (b / a) a
    · rw [div_mul_cancel']
#align abs_abs_div_abs_le abs_abs_div_abs_le
